sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEM, or Shem, the ſon of Noah, memorable for his filial piety in concealing the folly and diſgrace of his father; for which he received a remarkable benediction, about 2476 B. C. He lived to the age of 600 years.
Ras SeM. See RAS Sem and PETRIFIED City.
